name: CUST_SVC_NOTES
description: The CUST_SVC_NOTES table contains information about the notes that are attached to each customer service communication.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the customer service communication.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note attached to a customer service communication.

columns.name: NOTE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the note was created.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the note.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
